content.raw:
Since we did pull request #571 and in this branch (see [amazon testing run for this branch](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-amazon-vrc/37/consoleFull)) SensorManager_TEST is failing.

Working now in a patch, don't know if it comes from higher levels, but imagePub in CameraSensor::IsActive is null when call [->HasConnections]( #!/osrf/gazebo/src/eacff658f3ec5e89577ad00a10dfc03b75b2f87b/gazebo/sensors/CameraSensor.cc?at=default#cl-222)

UPDATE: sorry, I thought this branch was on top of log_debug. imagePub error refers to log_debug branch debugging. Still not tested in this branch.
